DNS
Class ZoneResponse

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--DNS.ZoneResponse
public class ZoneResponse
extends java.lang.Object

The Response from a query to Zone.findRecords().

See Also:
Zone

          If the query was successful, return the answers

          Is the answer to the query that the data does not exist?
